程序包 org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.core.api

接口 InventoryIncrementalJobAPI

  • 所有超级接口:
    PipelineJobAPI, org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.util.spi.type.typed.TypedSPI
    所有已知实现类:
    AbstractInventoryIncrementalJobAPIImpl
    public interface InventoryIncrementalJobAPI
extends PipelineJobAPI
    Inventory incremental job API.

      • alterProcessConfiguration

        void alterProcessConfiguration​(PipelineContextKey contextKey,
                               PipelineProcessConfiguration processConfig)
        Alter process configuration.
        参数:
        contextKey - context key
        processConfig - process configuration

      • showProcessConfiguration

        PipelineProcessConfiguration showProcessConfiguration​(PipelineContextKey contextKey)
        Show process configuration.
        参数:
        contextKey - context key
        返回:
        process configuration, non-null

      • persistJobOffsetInfo

        void persistJobOffsetInfo​(String jobId,
                          JobOffsetInfo jobOffsetInfo)
        Persist job offset info.
        参数:
        jobId - job id
        jobOffsetInfo - job offset info.

      • getJobOffsetInfo

        JobOffsetInfo getJobOffsetInfo​(String jobId)
        Get job offset info.
        参数:
        jobId - job id
        返回:
        job offset progress

      • getJobProgress

        Map<Integer,​InventoryIncrementalJobItemProgress> getJobProgress​(PipelineJobConfiguration pipelineJobConfig)
        Get job progress.
        参数:
        pipelineJobConfig - job configuration
        返回:
        each sharding item progress

      • getJobItemProgress

        Optional<InventoryIncrementalJobItemProgress> getJobItemProgress​(String jobId,
                                                                 int shardingItem)
        从接口复制的说明: PipelineJobAPI
        Get job item progress.
        指定者:
        getJobItemProgress 在接口中 PipelineJobAPI
        参数:
        jobId - job id
        shardingItem - sharding item
        返回:
        job item progress, may be null

        返回:

      • listDataConsistencyCheckAlgorithms

        List all data consistency check algorithms from SPI.
        返回:

      • buildDataConsistencyCalculateAlgorithm

        DataConsistencyCalculateAlgorithm buildDataConsistencyCalculateAlgorithm​(PipelineJobConfiguration jobConfig,
                                                                         String algorithmType,
                                                                         Properties algorithmProps)
        Build data consistency calculate algorithm.
        参数:
        jobConfig - job configuration
        algorithmType - algorithm type
        algorithmProps - algorithm properties
        返回:
        calculate algorithm

      • dataConsistencyCheck

        Map<String,​DataConsistencyCheckResult> dataConsistencyCheck​(PipelineJobConfiguration pipelineJobConfig,
                                                                  DataConsistencyCalculateAlgorithm calculateAlgorithm,
                                                                  ConsistencyCheckJobItemProgressContext progressContext)
        Do data consistency check.
        参数:
        pipelineJobConfig - job configuration
        calculateAlgorithm - calculate algorithm
        progressContext - consistency check job item progress context
        返回:
        each logic table check result

      • aggregateDataConsistencyCheckResults

        boolean aggregateDataConsistencyCheckResults​(String jobId,
                                             Map<String,​DataConsistencyCheckResult> checkResults)
        Aggregate data consistency check results.
        参数:
        jobId - job id
        checkResults - check results
        返回:
        check success or not

      • rollback

        void rollback​(String jobId)
       throws SQLException
        Rollback pipeline job.
        参数:
        jobId - job id
        抛出:
        SQLException - when rollback underlying database data

      • commit

        void commit​(String jobId)
        Commit pipeline job.
        参数:
        jobId - job id
